She pretty much lives in her favorite princess dress.
Even if she gets a stain, she'll wear it for a week straight.
So I use Tide to get out those week-old stains and Downy to get it fresh and soft.
And since I'm the one who has to do the laundry,...
...I do what any expert dad would do: I let her play sheriff.
Tide and Downy are proud to support the National Fatherhood Initiative.
